item.title: Domestic waste ⚠️fecal matter - cul-de-sac of Ravenscourt Road, 9th August
item.description:
Domestic waste has been fly-tipped in the cul-de-sac of Ravenscourt Road. This includes pet waste and food waste which has attracted wildlife. Bags have been ripped and the waste has been spread about. There are lots of flies about. Please could this be removed?

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 4, Arbrook Close, St Paul's Cray, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Abandoned vehicle, 9th August
item.description:
This vehicle has been parked on front of the shop over 12 weeks without it moving at all. It does affect the every day operation of the business including deliveries and customer parking, especially some of our customers being from the older generation and/or disabled.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Salisbury Road, Southborough, London
Report on FixMyStreet
